Solspace - Code Pack - Change Log

1.2.1 (January 24, 2012)
 - Fixed a bug where Code Pack would not install in EE 1.x because of a call to PATH_THIRD.

1.2.0 (April 29, 2011)
 - Updated module to use Solspace Add-on Builder Framework in EE2.

1.1.1 (December 11, 2010)
 - Added conditionals to detect EE1 vs EE2 to make Code Packs smarter.
 - Modified Code Pack to now insert new template groups at the bottom of the list of groups.
 - Updated and enhanced Code Pack module CP area (in EE 2.x) to conform completely to native EE styling.
 - Fixed an error where duplicate index files were sometimes being inserted into template groups.

1.1.0 (October 21, 2010)
 - Updated module for EE 2.x compatibility.

1.0.0 (December 29, 2009)
 - Initial release.
